title: Incubator members say an experiment to create community went very wrong
itunes:title: Incubator members say an experiment to create community went very wrong
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: This week, Vox released an investigation into Launch House, a “professional social club” for tech founders, which among other activities, hosts members at a luxury property in Beverly Hills. But Vox reports that Launch House was, at times, more like a frat house with members alleging excessive partying and sexual assault. Launch House disputes some of these allegations. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams speaks with Vox senior correspondent Rebecca Jennings, who reported the story.

Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams speaks with Vox senior correspondent Rebecca Jennings, who reported the story.
